function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Opportunity for renewed emphasis on in-country partnerships and collaboration due to the pandemic.","Impact":"Enhancement of public engagement related to local wildlife and biodiversity issues.","Mitigation":"Implement protocols and guidelines for safe in-country collaboration and partnerships, prioritize public engagement in biodiversity conservation.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, virtual engagement platforms.","People":"Researcher and practitioners, local communities, conservation organizations.","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Withdrawal of researchers and practitioners from conservation sites due to travel restrictions, leading to the cancellation or postponement of research.","Impact":"Disruption of conservation research and activities, potential decline in conservation efforts.","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans for remote research and monitoring, prioritize local capacity building for conservation efforts.","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology, online research and monitoring tools.","People":"Researchers, practitioners, local communities.","Owner":"Conservation organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Lack of clear long-term vision affecting the continuity of conservation action and messaging post-pandemic.","Impact":"Risk of unsustainable work and fundraising models, lack of systemic change in interaction with nature.","Mitigation":"Develop long-term strategies for sustainable work and fundraising models, promote the need for systemic change in nature interaction.","Technologies":"Data analytics for long-term trend analysis, online fundraising platforms.","People":"Conservation practitioners, communities, funders.","Owner":"Conservation organizations, funders."}]}
